#Text=Meelo says : " You 're pretty , can I have some of your hair ? "
#Text=Mako says : " Looks like I have some competition . "
#Text=Ikki says : " And now for the grand tour .
#Text=Is this an all vegetarian island ?
#Text=Is that where you train airbending ?
#Text=Do we have to wear Air Acolyte clothes ?
#Text=Do we each get our own sky bison ?
#Text=And final question , how many trees are on this island ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " Yes .
#Text=Yes .
#Text=No .
#Text=No .
#Text=Ten thousand five hundred and fifty two .
#Text=" Mako says : " So , where are we going to be staying ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " You 're a boy .
#Text=Boys have to stay on the boys ' side .
#Text=" Jinora says : " I 'd be happy to show you to the men 's dormitory .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm a boy !
#Text=" Korra says : " Meelo , why do n't you go with the boys too ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " We shall meet again soon , beautiful woman .
#Text=" Korra says : " Ikki and I will take you to your room this way .
#Text="
